content:
Hi there @fitzgen (he/him) Shivam here,
I want to contribute for the wasmtime fuzzing project which was nominated during this years gsoc2020. While working on the proposal I had plenty of doubts regarding the concepts like fuzzing for ABI abstractions, heap safety and much more. Due to lack of time during the application process I had to apply with a very little knowledge about the goal which I wanted to clear out by proper communication. I wrote on the github issue page for same and it directed me here.
@Shivam Balikondwar thanks for this! We'll look but we're going to try to be fair to the other applicants as well.
Yeah no problem but I am doing it to know more about the project

Given the deadline has already passed and it is equally probable that I might get rejected so I am considering without the outcome.
Even if someone else gets selected I am completely fine with him working on the idea cause it's his right he has worked on it.
But I keep it up to you if you think it's fair then I shall look on it @Deian
(Or her.) We'll take a look! Excited that you're interested in this stuff!
